name: Kitchen
short_description: This large kitchen is filled with various foods in various stages of being prepared. Interestingly, there appear to be little fairies doing the cooking.
long_description: This large kitchen is brimming with activity. Pots and pans are strewn everywhere, containing food items in various stages of being prepared. Interestingly, the chefs seem to be tiny, hard-working fairies.

yellow door.description: This warm yellow door seems friendly enough.

cherry door.description: This aged cherry door has a copper keyhole.

slice of chocolate cake.description: This slice of chocolate cake looks so perfect. It has some sort of glittery icing on it and looks delicious.

frowning blue-haired fairy.description: This tiny blue-haired fairy is sighing in apparent disappointment.

busy blue-haired fairy.description: The tiny blue-haired fairy is busy working on a blackberry cobbler.

cast-iron stove.description: An iron cooking stove with some dry wood that needs to be lit in order to be able to cook. There's a large pan with some kind of sludge resting on top.

lit cast-iron stove.description: An iron cooking stove that is currently on and heating a large pan on top.

metal pan.description: The metal pan is resting on top of the stove and its contents are being heated. It seems that the heat has made the sludge turn into some kind of a golden liquid

golden potion.description: A potion that looks like liquid gold. You don't want to drink this

stack of cookbooks.description: Cookbooks of all shaped and sizes lie messily in a pile on the table. A lot of these seem to be for baked items and sweets. It seems the owner has a bit of a sweet-tooth.

red potion.description: A vial of some kind of red liquid. Covering it with your hand shows it shines in the dark. You shouldn't drink this.

copper key.description: A very ordinary key made of copper.
